00101 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00102 #include "config.h"

00106 #include "shell.h"
00107 #include "Getopt.h"
00108 #include <libgen.h>
00109 #include <pthread.h>
00110 #include <stdlib.h>
00111 #include <string.h>
00112 
00113 #include <stdio.h>
00114 #include <readline/readline.h>
00115 #include <readline/history.h>
00116 
00117 #define NBTHRMAX 64
00118 
00119 time_t ServerBootTime = 0 ;
00120 
00121 typedef struct shell_info__
00122 {
00123   
00124   int shell_id;
00125   
00126   char prompt[32];
00127   char script_file[128];
00128   
00129   pthread_t       thread;  
00130   pthread_attr_t  attrs;
00131   
00132   int status;
00133   
00134 } shell_info_t;
00135 
00136 shell_info_t thrlist[NBTHRMAX];
00137 
00138 int verbose = 0;
00139 
00140 
00141 
00142 void * LaunchShell( void * arg )
00143 {
00144   int rc;
00145   
00146   shell_info_t * p_info = (shell_info_t *) arg ;
00147   
00148   rc = shell_Init( verbose, p_info->script_file, p_info->prompt, p_info->shell_id );
00149 
00150   if (rc)
00151   {
00152     fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Init\n",rc) ;
00153     p_info->status = rc;
00154     pthread_exit(&p_info->status);
00155   }
00156 
00157   rc = shell_Launch();
00158 
00159   if (rc)
00160   {
00161     fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Launch\n",rc) ;
00162     p_info->status = rc;
00163     pthread_exit(&p_info->status);
00164   }
00165 
00166   p_info->status = 0;
00167   
00168   /* never reached */
00169   return &p_info->status;
00170   
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 int main( int argc , char ** argv )
00175 {
00176   
00177   
00178   static char * format = "h@vn:";
00179   static char * help = "Usage: %s [-h][-v][-n <nb>][Script_File1 [Script_File2]...]\n";
00180   
00181   int option, rc;
00182   
00183   int err_flag = 0;
00184   int flag_h = 0;
00185   
00186   int nb_instance = 0;
00187   
00188   char * prompt = "ganeshell>";
00189   char * script_file = NULL;  
00190   
00191   char * progname = basename(argv[0]);
00192   
00193   
00194   int nb_threads = 0;
00195 
00196   /* Set the Boot time */
00197   ServerBootTime = time( NULL ) ;
00198   
00199   /* disables Getopt error message */
00200   Opterr = 0;
00201   
00202   /* reinits Getopt processing */
00203   Optind = 1;
00204   
00205   
00206 
00207   
00208   while ((option = Getopt(argc, argv, format)) != -1)
00209   {   
00210     switch(option)
00211     {
00212       case 'h':
00213         if (flag_h)
00214           fprintf(stderr,
00215               "%s: warning: option 'h' has been specified more than once.\n",progname );
00216         else flag_h ++;
00217         break;
00218 
00219       case '@':
00220           /* A litlle backdoor to keep track of binary versions */
00221           printf( "%s compiled on %s at %s\n", progname, __DATE__, __TIME__ ) ;
00222           printf( "Release = %s\n", VERSION ) ;
00223           printf( "Release comment = %s\n",VERSION_COMMENT ) ;
00224           exit( 0 ) ;
00225           break ;
00226 
00227       case 'n':
00228         if (nb_instance)
00229           fprintf(stderr,
00230               "%s: warning: option 'n' has been specified more than once.\n",progname );
00231         else
00232           nb_instance = atoi( Optarg );
00233               
00234         break;
00235         
00236       case 'v':
00237         if (verbose)
00238           fprintf(stderr,
00239               "%s: warning: option 'v' has been specified more than once.\n",progname );
00240         else verbose ++;
00241         break;
00242         
00243       case '?':
00244         fprintf(stderr,"%s: unknown option : %c\n",progname,Optopt);
00245         err_flag ++;
00246         break;
00247     }    
00248   }
00249 
00250   
00251   /* help flag */  
00252   if ( flag_h || err_flag )
00253   {
00254     fprintf( stderr, help, basename(progname) );
00255     exit(err_flag);
00256   }
00257 
00258   /* Initialize history */
00259   using_history();
00260   
00261   
00262   /* case when the 'n' option is specified */
00263   if ( nb_instance != 0 )
00264   {
00265      int i;
00266     /* case when there two or more threads */  
00267     
00268     for ( i = 0 ; i < nb_instance; i++ )
00269     {      
00270       
00271       if (verbose)
00272         fprintf(stderr, "Starting thread %d using file %s...\n",
00273                 nb_threads, argv[Optind] );
00274       
00275       thrlist[nb_threads].shell_id = nb_threads;
00276       
00277       snprintf( thrlist[nb_threads].prompt, 32, "ganeshell-%d>", nb_threads );
00278       strncpy ( thrlist[nb_threads].script_file,argv[Optind], 128 );
00279       
00280       pthread_attr_init( &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs );
00281       pthread_attr_setscope(  &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs, PTHREAD_SCOPE_SYSTEM );
00282       
00283       nb_threads ++;
00284       
00285       if ( nb_threads >= NBTHRMAX )
00286       {
00287         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: Too much threads (%d > %d)\n",nb_threads, NBTHRMAX);
00288         exit(1);
00289       }
00290 
00291     }
00292     
00293     /* inits shell barriers */
00294     
00295     rc = shell_BarrierInit( nb_threads );
00296     
00297     if (rc)
00298     {
00299       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_BarrierInit\n",rc) ;
00300       exit(1);
00301     }
00302     
00303     /* launching threads */
00304     
00305     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00306     {
00307       rc = pthread_create(
00308           &thrlist[i].thread,
00309           &thrlist[i].attrs,
00310           LaunchShell ,
00311           &thrlist[i] );
00312 
00313       if (rc)
00314       {
00315         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in pthread_create\n",rc) ;
00316         exit(1);
00317       }
00318     
00319     }
00320     
00321     /* waiting for thread termination */
00322     
00323     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00324     {
00325       void * ret;
00326       pthread_join( thrlist[i].thread, &ret );
00327       
00328     }
00329     
00330     exit(0);
00331     
00332   }    
00333   /* case when there is only zero or one script file */
00334   else if ( Optind >= (argc-1) )
00335   {        
00336     
00337     if ( Optind == (argc-1) )
00338     {
00339       script_file = argv[Optind];
00340     }
00341     
00342     rc = shell_Init( verbose, script_file, prompt, 0 );
00343 
00344     if (rc)
00345     {
00346       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Init\n",rc) ;
00347       exit(1);
00348     }
00349 
00350     rc = shell_Launch();
00351 
00352     if (rc)
00353     {
00354       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Launch\n",rc) ;
00355       exit(1);
00356     }
00357 
00358     exit(0);
00359     
00360   }
00361   else
00362   {
00363     int i;
00364     /* case when there two or more threads */  
00365     
00366     for ( i = Optind ; i < argc; i++ )
00367     {      
00368       
00369       if (verbose)
00370         fprintf(stderr, "Starting thread %d using file %s...\n",
00371                 nb_threads, argv[i] );
00372       
00373       thrlist[nb_threads].shell_id = nb_threads;
00374       
00375       snprintf( thrlist[nb_threads].prompt, 32, "ganeshell-%d>", nb_threads );
00376       strncpy ( thrlist[nb_threads].script_file,argv[i], 128 );
00377       
00378       pthread_attr_init( &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs );
00379       pthread_attr_setscope(  &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs, PTHREAD_SCOPE_SYSTEM );
00380       
00381       nb_threads ++;
00382       
00383       if ( nb_threads >= NBTHRMAX )
00384       {
00385         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: Too much threads (%d > %d)\n",nb_threads, NBTHRMAX);
00386         exit(1);
00387       }
00388 
00389     }
00390     
00391     /* inits shell barriers */
00392     
00393     rc = shell_BarrierInit( nb_threads );
00394     
00395     if (rc)
00396     {
00397       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_BarrierInit\n",rc) ;
00398       exit(1);
00399     }
00400     
00401     /* launching threads */
00402     
00403     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00404     {
00405       rc = pthread_create(
00406           &thrlist[i].thread,
00407           &thrlist[i].attrs,
00408           LaunchShell ,
00409           &thrlist[i] );
00410 
00411       if (rc)
00412       {
00413         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in pthread_create\n",rc) ;
00414         exit(1);
00415       }
00416     
00417     }
00418     
00419     /* waiting for thread termination */
00420     
00421     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00422     {
00423       void * ret;
00424       pthread_join( thrlist[i].thread, &ret );
00425       
00426     }
00427     
00428     exit(0);
00429     
00430   }
00431     
00432 }
